title: PUBLIC ASSISTANCE – Adds to existing law to provide that the director of the Department of Health and Welfare shall seek a waiver to exclude candy and soda from supplemental nutrition assistance program benefits.
subject: FOOD
HEALTH
HEALTH AND WELFARE DEPARTMENT
PUBLIC ASSISTANCE
